bio:
Torkild, a Nord man, is one of the Hunters of Hircine. Hircine is the Daedric Lord of the Hunt. Torkild may be found inside Bloated Man's Grotto, which is located in the mountains at the northern edge of Falkreath Hold. 
Torkild has earned the name "Torkild the Fearsome". He has long gray hair and a mustache. He wears a set of iron armor with a matching pair of gauntlets and boots. His weapon of choice is a battleaxe.
Torkild has been sent by Lord Hircine to kill the werewolf Sinding, to send him to the Hunting Grounds. The Hunting Grounds is the afterlife destination associated with Hircine, and is where all werewolves and followers of Hircine are sent after their death. If the player expresses the intention to attack and kill Sinding, Torkild will help the player, and will be friendly towards the player after Sinding is killed. If the player indicates that they intend to help Sinding, Torkild will become hostile to the player.
name: Torkild the Fearsome
